name: The Cameraman (PxGluz)
description:
Welcome to The Cameraman!!

Here we have the version we submitted to the deadline, but on itch.io we have a WebGL version and 1 hour more worth of work, to polish up some stuff, feel free to vote on whichever one!

STORY:

You suddenly wake up in a lab with no clue of your surroundings, all you know is that you have to get out. A monster is roaming the halls, and is after you, all you have to defend yourself are a couple of matches and a device that shows you the pictures the monster takes EVERY 10 SECONDS. Will you manage your matches wisely and find all the keycards to escape? See what the Cameraman has in store for you...

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

Ctrl - Crouch

Shift - Sprint

Mouse - Look

Left Click (Hold) - Interact

F - Light/Throw Match

Tab (Hold) - Show HUD

Escape - Back to Menu

PLANS FOR THE GAME
  • We'll be adding a proper story and a lot more mechanics
  • Balancing the game more, since the current version is a jam version
  • Fine tuning the audio
  • And of course bring more scares to the table :)
